definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Madame Curie warned learners not to go too fast.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫人告誡初學者不要圖快。

sentences.english: In his library he had been always sure of leisure and tranquillity ;
sentences.chinese: 他平常待在書房裏就是爲了要圖個悠閒清淨。

sentences.english: He had prepared a map for his mine defense.
sentences.chinese: 他已準備好一張佈雷要圖。
